column3: 2015 at 11:00 A.M. at Mt. Zion Shoup Cemetery  Graveside service to be held Friday
column5: 2015 at 11:00 A.M. at Mt. Zion Shoup Cemetery located on the SE corner of Indian Ripple Road and North Fairfield Road in Beaver-creek. Please plan to visit with the family after the service for lunch. Services in care of MORRIS SONS FUNERAL HOME.
